name: The Runner (The Coder GD)
description:
Hey there this is The Coder GD

I was planninging to make a game last month but I couldn't get time to do so. I tried my best and finish this small prototype game in 7 days.

Controls :

Up Arrow - Jump

Down Arrow - Roll

Left and Right Arrow : To move

Wait for some time at start menu to see something different :)

Game might contains bugs(if so please report)

Any suggestions related to the game or anything would be appreciated 😊😊😊

I try my best to steal time after my studies to atleast make a game a month.

At last thanks for checking the game :)
